member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Interop.TimeCriticalScope.Dispose
member.summary: Restores the latency mode of the GC to its original value.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Interop.TimeCriticalScope.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance and sets the latence mode of the GC.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Interop.TimeCriticalScope
member.summary: The TimeCriticalScope sets the Latency Mode of the GC to 'LowLatency' during the lifetime of the instance (scope).

member.summary: Access to the host commands. Can be null early in the initialization process.

member.remarks: When AudioInputCount, AudioOutputCount or InitialDelay have changed the IoChanged() method is called automatically.

member.name: T:Jacobi.Vst.Interop.MemoryTracker
member.summary: The MemoryTracker class maintains a list of native allocated objects that can be deleted (freed) at another time.
member.remarks: Is a managed class because it is used as a member of a managed class.

member.summary: The Bootstrapper class loads the managed plugin assembly.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.GetInputSpeakerArrangement
member.summary: Gets the input speaker arrangement.
member.returns: Returns the speaker arrangement.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.GetChunkFile
member.summary: Gets the native path of currently loading bank or project.
member.returns: Return the file path to the chunk file.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.EditFile(System.String)
member.summary: Opens an audio editor window; defined by .
member.param: Must not be null or empty.
member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.CloseWindow(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Closes a window previously opened by .
member.param: The window handle.
member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.OpenWindow
member.summary: Opens a new host window.
member.returns: Returns the Win32 HWND window handle.

member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.WillReplaceOrAccumulate
member.summary: Returns an indication how the Host processes audio.
member.returns: Returns 0=Not Supported, 1=Replace, 2=Accumulate.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.GetNextPlugin(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the next Plugin based on the specified .
member.param: A zero-based pin index. Specify -1 for next.
member.returns: Return System.IntPtr.Zero when unsuccessful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.GetPreviousPlugin(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the previous Plugin based on the specified .
member.param: A zero-based pin index. Specify -1 for next.
member.returns: Return System.IntPtr.Zero when unsuccessful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.NeedIdle
member.summary: Indicates to the host that the Plugin needs idle calls (outside its editor window).
member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.summary: Returns the integer value for +1.0 representation, or 1 if full single float precision is maintained in automation.
member.param: A zero-based index into the parmeter collection or -1 for all/any.
member.returns: Returns the integer value for +1.0 representation, or 1 if full single float precision is maintained in automation.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.GetAutomatableParameterCount
member.summary: Returns the number of parameters that support automation.
member.returns: Returns the number of parameters that support automation.

member.summary: Retrieves the tempo at specified location.
member.param: A zero-based sample index.
member.returns: Returns the tempo in bmp * 10000.

member.summary: Sets a new time for the Host.
member.param: Must not be null.
Unclear what the purpose is for these flags.
member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.WantMidi
member.summary: Indicates to the Host that the Plugin wants to process Midi events.
member.returns: Returns True when the call was successful.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.PinConnected(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reports whether the spefied pin at the is connected.
member.param: A zero-based index of the connection pin.
Report in output pins when True, otherwise (False) report on input pins.
member.returns: Returns True when the pin is connected, otherwise False is returned.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.CloseFileSelector(Jacobi.Vst.Core.VstFileSelect)
member.summary: Cleans up the unmanaged resources consumed by a call to .
member.param: The exact same instance that was also passed to .
member.returns: Returns true if supported by the host.
member.remarks: This method must always be called when returned true. Otherwise unmanaged memory will leak.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.OpenFileSelector(Jacobi.Vst.Core.VstFileSelect)
member.summary: Opens the file selector in the host.
member.param: A structure describing the options and settings.
member.returns: Returns true if supported by the host.
member.remarks: On return (if true) the selected paths are filled in .

member.summary: Notifies the host that the parameter at was edited.
member.param: A zero-based index into the parameter collection.
member.returns: Returns true if supported by the host.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.BeginEdit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Notifies the host that the parameter at is about to be edited.
member.param: A zero-based index into the parameter collection.
member.returns: Returns true if supported by the host.

member.summary: Retrieves the latency concerning audio input.

member.name: M:Jacobi.Vst.Plugin.Interop.HostCommandsImpl.SetParameterAutomated(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Notifies the Host that the value of the parameter at has a new .
member.param: Must be greater than zero and smaller than the parameter count.
The new value assigned to the parameter.
member.remarks: The plugin can call this method to allow the parameter value change to be automated by the host.
